definition: A process of fixing or restoring something that is damaged, broken, or malfunctioning, typically referring to physical objects or mechanical systems. It is commonly used to describe the act of repairing various items, such as appliances, vehicles, electronics, or household objects.

examples.german: Die Reparatur des Autos dauerte zwei Tage.
examples.english: The repair of the car took two days.

examples.german: Ich muss eine Reparatur an meiner Waschmaschine durchführen lassen.
examples.english: I need to have a repair done on my washing machine.
The repair costs are very high.

examples.german: Die Reparatur des Dachs wird nächste Woche beginnen.
examples.english: The repair of the roof will start next week.

examples.german: Die Reparatur des Computers war erfolgreich.
examples.english: The repair of the computer was successful.
